title: Any Good Tanks?
body:
recently i have been thinking about playing ranked  going top and/or mid but i only have syndra for mid and zed for both top and mid. I need help finding a tanky top laner.
i normally play high damage champions so I hardly ever play tanky champs.

replies.body:
DO NOT PLAY ZED TOP, take him out of your top lane champion pool immediately, I'm assuming you're unranked and haven't played much of ranked at all so the top 3 I recommend are:

1. Darius
2. Renekton
3. Kled

If you haven't played these champions before LEARN THEM IN NORMALS FIRST, DO NOT GO STRAIGHT INTO RANKED

tanks are high damage dealers tho?
assassin, dps??

mundo is good this patch
Mundo is worse than useless this patch, his winrate is struggling to stay above 45%.  Any half decent top will murder him.
